segments.source_content: # i18n - Introduction

translations.zh-hant: # 國際化 - 簡介

segments.source_content: It is **easy to translate a Docusaurus website** with its internationalization ([i18n](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internationalization_and_localization)) support.

translations.zh-hant: 透過國際化 ([i18n](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internationalization_and_localization)) 支援，**翻譯 Docusaurus 網站非常容易**。

segments.source_content: ## Goals {#goals}

translations.zh-hant: ## 目標 {#goals}

segments.source_content: It is important to understand the **design decisions** behind the Docusaurus i18n support.

translations.zh-hant: 理解 Docusaurus 國際化支援背後的**設計決策**非常重要。

segments.source_content: For more context, you can read the initial [RFC](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3317) and [PR](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/3325).

translations.zh-hant: 更多背景資訊，您可以閱讀最初的 [RFC](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3317) 和 [PR](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/3325)。

segments.source_content: ### i18n goals {#i18n-goals}

translations.zh-hant: ### 國際化目標 {#i18n-goals}

segments.source_content: The goals of the Docusaurus i18n system are:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 國際化系統的目標是：

segments.source_content:
- **Simple**: just put the translated files in the correct filesystem location
- **Flexible translation workflows**: use Git (monorepo, forks, or submodules), SaaS software, FTP
- **Flexible deployment options**: single, multiple domains, or hybrid
- **Modular**: allow plugin authors to provide i18n support
- **Low-overhead runtime**: documentation is mostly static and does not require heavy JS libraries or polyfills
- **Scalable build-times**: allow building and deploying localized sites independently
- **Localize assets**: an image of your site might contain text that should be translated
- **No coupling**: not forced to use any SaaS, yet integrations are possible
- **Easy to use with [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/)**: a lot of Docusaurus v1 sites use Crowdin and should be able to migrate to v2
- **Good SEO defaults**: we set useful SEO headers like [`hreflang`](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/crawling/localized-versions) for you
- **RTL support**: locales reading right-to-left (Arabic, Hebrew, etc.) are supported and easy to implement
- **Default translations**: classic theme labels are translated for you in [many languages](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-theme-translations/locales)

translations.zh-hant:
- **簡單**：只需將翻譯檔案放在正確的檔案系統位置
- **靈活的翻譯工作流程**：使用 Git（單一儲存庫、分支或子模組）、SaaS 軟體、FTP
- **靈活的部署選項**：單一、多個網域或混合
- **模組化**：允許插件作者提供國際化支援
- **低開銷運行時**：文件主要是靜態的，不需要繁重的 JS 庫或填充程式
- **可擴展的建置時間**：允許獨立建置和部署本地化網站
- **本地化資源**：網站圖片可能包含需要翻譯的文字
- **無耦合**：不強制使用任何 SaaS，但可以整合
- **易於與 [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/) 一起使用**：許多 Docusaurus v1 網站使用 Crowdin，應該能夠遷移到 v2
- **良好的 SEO 預設**：我們為您設置有用的 SEO 標頭，如 [`hreflang`](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/crawling/localized-versions)
- **RTL 支援**：支援從右到左閱讀的語言環境（阿拉伯語、希伯來語等）且易於實現
- **預設翻譯**：經典主題標籤已為您翻譯成[多種語言](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-theme-translations/locales)

segments.source_content: ### i18n non-goals {#i18n-non-goals}

translations.zh-hant: ### 國際化非目標 {#i18n-non-goals}

segments.source_content: We don't provide support for:

translations.zh-hant: 我們不提供以下支援：

segments.source_content:
- **Automatic locale detection**: opinionated, and best done on the [server (your hosting provider)](../deployment.mdx)
- **Translation SaaS software**: you are responsible to understand the external tools of your choice
- **Translation of slugs**: technically complicated, little SEO value

translations.zh-hant:
- **自動語言環境檢測**：這是主觀的，最好在[伺服器（您的託管提供商）](../deployment.mdx)上完成
- **翻譯 SaaS 軟體**：您需要自行理解所選的外部工具
- **翻譯網址片段**：技術複雜，SEO 價值低

segments.source_content: ## Translation workflow {#translation-workflow}

translations.zh-hant: ## 翻譯工作流程 {#translation-workflow}

segments.source_content: ### Overview {#overview}

translations.zh-hant: ### 概述 {#overview}

segments.source_content: Overview of the workflow to create a translated Docusaurus website:

translations.zh-hant: 創建翻譯版 Docusaurus 網站的工作流程概述：

segments.source_content:
1. **Configure**: declare the default locale and alternative locales in [`docusaurus.config.js`](../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#i18n)
2. **Translate**: put the translation files at the correct filesystem location
3. **Deploy**: build and deploy your site using a single or multi-domain strategy

translations.zh-hant:
1. **配置**：在 [`docusaurus.config.js`](../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#i18n) 中聲明預設語言環境和替代語言環境
2. **翻譯**：將翻譯檔案放在正確的檔案系統位置
3. **部署**：使用單一或多網域策略建置和部署您的網站

segments.source_content: ### Translation files {#translation-files}

translations.zh-hant: ### 翻譯檔案 {#translation-files}

segments.source_content: You will work with three kinds of translation files.

translations.zh-hant: 您將處理三種翻譯檔案。

segments.source_content: #### Markdown files {#markdown-files}

translations.zh-hant: #### Markdown 檔案 {#markdown-files}

segments.source_content: This is the main content of your Docusaurus website.

translations.zh-hant: 這是您 Docusaurus 網站的主要內容。

segments.source_content: Markdown and MDX documents are translated as a whole, to fully preserve the translation context, instead of splitting each sentence as a separate string.

translations.zh-hant: Markdown 和 MDX 文件是整體翻譯的，以完全保留翻譯上下文，而不是將每個句子拆分為單獨的字串。

segments.source_content: #### JSON files {#json-files}

translations.zh-hant: #### JSON 檔案 {#json-files}

segments.source_content: JSON is used to translate:

translations.zh-hant: JSON 用於翻譯：

segments.source_content:
- Your React code: standalone React pages in `src/pages`, or other components
- Layout labels provided through `themeConfig`: navbar, footer
- Layout labels provided through plugin options: docs sidebar category labels, blog sidebar title...

translations.zh-hant:
- 您的 React 代碼：`src/pages` 中的獨立 React 頁面或其他組件
- 通過 `themeConfig` 提供的佈局標籤：導航欄、頁腳
- 通過插件選項提供的佈局標籤：文件側邊欄類別標籤、部落格側邊欄標題...

segments.source_content: The JSON format used is called **Chrome i18n**:

translations.zh-hant: 使用的 JSON 格式稱為 **Chrome i18n**：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_17c579d2

segments.source_content: The choice was made for 2 reasons:

translations.zh-hant: 選擇此格式有兩個原因：

segments.source_content:
- **Description attribute**: to help translators with additional context
- **Widely supported**: [Chrome extensions](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/mv2/i18n-messages/), [Crowdin](https://support.crowdin.com/file-formats/chrome-json/), [Transifex](https://docs.transifex.com/formats/chrome-json), [Phrase](https://help.phrase.com/help/chrome-json-messages), [Applanga](https://www.applanga.com/docs/formats/chrome_i18n_json), etc.

translations.zh-hant:
- **描述屬性**：為翻譯者提供額外上下文
- **廣泛支援**：[Chrome擴充功能](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/mv2/i18n-messages/)、[Crowdin](https://support.crowdin.com/file-formats/chrome-json/)、[Transifex](https://docs.transifex.com/formats/chrome-json)、[Phrase](https://help.phrase.com/help/chrome-json-messages)、[Applanga](https://www.applanga.com/docs/formats/chrome_i18n_json)等

segments.source_content: #### Data files {#data-files}

translations.zh-hant: #### 資料檔案 {#data-files}

segments.source_content: Some plugins may read from external data files that are localized as a whole. For example, the blog plugin uses an [`authors.yml`](../blog.mdx#global-authors) file that can be translated by creating a copy under `i18n/[locale]/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog/authors.yml`.

translations.zh-hant: 某些插件可能會讀取需整體本地化的外部資料檔案。例如，部落格插件使用的[`authors.yml`](../blog.mdx#global-authors)檔案可透過在`i18n/[locale]/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog/authors.yml`路徑下建立副本進行翻譯。

segments.source_content: ### Translation files location {#translation-files-location}

translations.zh-hant: ### 翻譯檔案存放位置 {#translation-files-location}

segments.source_content: The translation files should be created at the correct filesystem location.

translations.zh-hant: 翻譯檔案應建立在正確的檔案系統路徑下。

segments.source_content: Each locale and plugin has its own `i18n` subfolder:

translations.zh-hant: 每個語言區域與插件都有專屬的`i18n`子資料夾：

segments.source_content:
```
website/i18n/[locale]/[pluginName]/...
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_890e01bc

segments.source_content:
:::note

For multi-instance plugins, the path is `website/i18n/[locale]/[pluginName]-[pluginId]/...`.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

多實例插件的路徑格式為`website/i18n/[locale]/[pluginName]-[pluginId]/...`。

:::

segments.source_content: Translating a very simple Docusaurus site in French would lead to the following tree:

translations.zh-hant: 翻譯一個簡單的法語版Docusaurus網站會產生以下目錄結構：

segments.source_content:
```bash
website/i18n
└── fr
    ├── code.json  # Any text label present in the React code
    │              # Includes text labels from the themes' code
    ├── docusaurus-plugin-content-blog # translation data the blog plugin needs
    │   └── 2020-01-01-hello.md
    │
    ├── docusaurus-plugin-content-docs # translation data the docs plugin needs
    │   ├── current
    │   │   ├── doc1.md
    │   │   └── doc2.mdx
    │   └── current.json
    │
    └── docusaurus-theme-classic # translation data the classic theme needs
        ├── footer.json   # Text labels in your footer theme config
        └── navbar.json   # Text labels in your navbar theme config
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_59534425

segments.source_content: The JSON files are initialized with the [`docusaurus write-translations`](../cli.mdx#docusaurus-write-translations-sitedir) CLI command. Each plugin sources its own translated content under the corresponding folder, while the `code.json` file defines all text labels used in the React code.

translations.zh-hant: JSON檔案可透過[`docusaurus write-translations`](../cli.mdx#docusaurus-write-translations-sitedir) CLI指令初始化。各插件在對應資料夾下管理自身翻譯內容，而`code.json`檔案則定義React程式碼中使用的文字標籤。

segments.source_content: Each content plugin or theme is different, and **defines its own translation files location**:

translations.zh-hant: 每個內容插件或主題皆有**自訂的翻譯檔案存放規則**：

segments.source_content:
- [Docs i18n](../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx#i18n)
- [Blog i18n](../api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx#i18n)
- [Pages i18n](../api/plugins/plugin-content-pages.mdx#i18n)
- [Themes i18n](../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#i18n)

translations.zh-hant:
- [文件國際化](../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx#i18n)
- [部落格國際化](../api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx#i18n)
- [頁面國際化](../api/plugins/plugin-content-pages.mdx#i18n)
